notification_on_new_version.label: Notify me on new version
notification_on_new_version.tooltip: When checked, on Streamlabs Chatbot startup the script will check for updates and notify you if there is any

faceit_cooldown_message.value: $username, not too fast! You need to wait $cooldownTimer seconds till you can use $command again
faceit_cooldown_message.label: Cooldown message
faceit_cooldown_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when the user of a command is on cooldown

faceit_permission_message.value: $username, gotcha! You don't have permission to use $command
faceit_permission_message.label: Permission Error Message
faceit_permission_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when the user of a command does not have permission to use it

faceit_elo_command.label: Command
faceit_elo_command.tooltip: The text that should trigger the Faceit Elo Check command

faceit_elo_default_argument.label: Your faceit nickname (MANDATORY)
faceit_elo_default_argument.tooltip: This is the user the command is going to check when no param is included

faceit_elo_permission.label: User Permission
faceit_elo_permission.tooltip: The group of users that can use this command

faceit_elo_permission_specific.label: Specific User
faceit_elo_permission_specific.tooltip: This field should only be filled when User Permission is set to user_specific.

faceit_elo_cooldown.label: Cooldown (in seconds)
faceit_elo_cooldown.tooltip: How much time an user has to wait before using this command again

faceit_elo_message.value: $username, the Faceit ELO for $arg1 is $elo that makes him level $level.
faceit_elo_message.label: Message
faceit_elo_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when using the command

faceit_elo_error_message.value: Nice try, $username, but $arg1's ELO is under a rock, 'cause I can't find it.
faceit_elo_error_message.label: Error Message
faceit_elo_error_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chart when using the command and there's an error

faceit_session_start_command.label: Command
faceit_session_start_command.tooltip: The text that should trigger the Faceit Elo Check command

faceit_session_start_permission.label: User Permission
faceit_session_start_permission.tooltip: The group of users that can use this command

faceit_session_start_permission_specific.label: Specific User
faceit_session_start_permission_specific.tooltip: This field should only be filled when User Permission is set to user_specific.

faceit_session_start_cooldown.label: Cooldown (in seconds)
faceit_session_start_cooldown.tooltip: How much time an user has to wait before using this command again

faceit_session_start_message.value: $username, a new session started, I'll keep track of the matches played from now on.
faceit_session_start_message.label: Message
faceit_session_start_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when using the command

faceit_session_start_error_message.value: Oh, dear, $username, something went wrong trying to get this session's data. Try it again later and if the issue persists contact the streamer.
faceit_session_start_error_message.label: Error Message
faceit_session_start_error_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chart when using the command and there's an error

faceit_session_start_on_init.label: Start on SLCB startup
faceit_session_start_on_init.tooltip: When checked, a new session will be created when opening SLCB

faceit_session_include_all_matches.label: Include hub and other custom matches
faceit_session_include_all_matches.tooltip: When checked, this command will check all matches and not only matchmaking

faceit_session_command.label: Command
faceit_session_command.tooltip: The text that should trigger the Faceit Session Check command

faceit_session_default_argument.label: Your faceit nickname (MANDATORY)
faceit_session_default_argument.tooltip: This is the user the command is going to check when no param is included

faceit_session_permission.label: User Permission
faceit_session_permission.tooltip: The group of users that can use this command

faceit_session_permission_specific.label: Specific User
faceit_session_permission_specific.tooltip: This field should only be filled when User Permission is set to user_specific.

faceit_session_cooldown.label: Cooldown (in seconds)
faceit_session_cooldown.tooltip: How much time an user has to wait before using this command again

faceit_session_message.value: $username, we've played $total_matches games, won $won_matches, lost $lost_matches and this session elo balance is $elo_balance.
faceit_session_message.label: Message
faceit_session_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when using the command

faceit_session_error_message.value: Oh, dear, $username, something went wrong trying to get this session's data. Try it again later and if the issue persists contact the streamer.
faceit_session_error_message.label: Error Message
faceit_session_error_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chart when using the command and there's an error
